page.title: 14CRIME IN WALSGRAVE
page.content: The most common crime around our area is stealing,e.g.from shops or houses. The most popular age for crime is between 16 and 18. There are many gangs going round my area,the most popular areas being Bell Green and Stoke Heath.These gangs have a lot to do with stealing in our area and they cause a lot of damage when they fight. The different sorts of gangs are Punk Rockers,Skinheads,Mods,Trendies and Heavy Metal gangs.These gangs often fight among themselves.They also frighten old people and vandalise property. Another common crime is vandalism when people get their windows smashed,walls are written on,kicked down,trees are pulled etc.The rate payer has to foot the bill for this kind of damage. Vandalism usually takes place at night
